title: Stir-fry pork with Chinese greens
ingredients: ['300 g (10½ oz) pork fillet (tenderloin)', '3 tbsp dry sherry', '4 tsp toasted sesame oil', '1 tbsp light soy sauce', '1 bunch spring onions', '200 g (7 oz) mange-tout', '340 g (12 oz) pak choy', '250 g (8½ oz) medium Chinese egg noodles', '1 tbsp groundnut oil']
